description: Issue owners and users with push access can edit an issue.

assignee.description: Login for the user that this issue should be assigned to. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set the assignee for new issues. The assignee is silently dropped otherwise. **This field is deprecated.**_

milestone.description: The `number` of the milestone to associate this issue with. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set the milestone for new issues. The milestone is silently dropped otherwise._

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue. Pass one or more Labels to _replace_ the set of Labels on this Issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all Labels from the Issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set labels for issues. Labels are silently dropped otherwise._

assignees.description: Logins for Users to assign to this issue. Pass one or more user logins to _replace_ the set of assignees on this Issue. Send an empty array (`[]`) to clear all assignees from the Issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set assignees for new issues. Assignees are silently dropped otherwise._

state.description: State of the issue. Either `open` or `closed`.
